name: One Attempt for the Future
description:
War is coming. Everyone can feel it, governments are salivating over it, for it is one of the storms of change. Two soldiers find themselves in the middle of this mess, ordered to perform the assassination to end all assassinations. Whether this is meant to stall or accelerate the tides of war, neither could say. Their focus instead is making sure their bodies don't betray them again.

CW: Drug Use, Blood
